title: Excursion to the bridge of friendship
brief_description: A sophisticated Sydney woman gets back to her cultural roots in this wonderful black and white musical tale of female bonding and Bulgarian folk singers. Christina Andreef packs this joyful short with plenty of spirit as it briskly reinvents and updates the classic Hollywood movie musical maxim of ‘putting on a show’.
